Sensor:IMU,Specifications:Digital-output X-, Y-, and Z-Axis angular rate sensors (gyroscopes) with a user-programmable full-,scale range of ±250, ±500, ±1000, and ±2000°/sec,External sync signal connected to the FSYNC pin supports image, video and GPS synchronization,Integrated 16-bit ADCs enable simultaneous sampling of gyros,Enhanced bias and sensitivity temperature stability reduces the need for user calibration,Improved low-frequency noise performance,Digitally-programmable low-pass filter,Gyroscope operating current: 3.6mA,Standby current: 5μA,Factory calibrated sensitivity scale factor,User self-test,Accelerometer Features,The triple-axis MEMS accelerometer in MPU-60X0 includes a wide range of features:,Communicationspins:SDA,SCL
